title: Discovery QRD-061: dimensional_fusion
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) exhibits novel properties under dimensional_fusion transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: An innovative implementable distributed system fusing dimensions in Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_dimensional_fusion(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit))
